name: Kurikulink @Ignister
desc: (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "@Ignister" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. When a card or effect is activated that targets a Cyberse monster(s) you control and you control a Cyberse monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Kurikulink @Ignister" once per turn.
